item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Saturday: Areas of Mysterious fog before 10am. Otherwise, mostly sunny with clear blue skys, with a high near 63. North wind around 6 mph becoming east.  Sounds good enough for this kind of event.

 

Cotton Hollow is a place i used to go to as a kid and to this day is still  a unique location.

This location has a few good photo areas. 

Swimming is optional for the brave.

 

 

For current weather : http://www.usairnet.com/cgi-bin/launch/code...

 

 

 

From Hartford Use apx #500 HOPEWELL RD Glastonbury ct for GPS and maps,

 

Take RT 2 South to rte 17 South, 

When approaching South Glastonbury, look for Hopewell Rd on your left.

Take Hopewell Rd for apx 1 mile and the Pool and other parking area is on your right -- its before Hopewell splits with Mattson Hill rd.

Park in either lot, I personally like the Pool lot since its paved.

------------------------------------------

Bring a Waterside Snack for the beach or rock.

Bring your chairs and some pot luck food for after in Wethersfield.

Just follow us from Cotton Hollow if you do not know my home address.

I have wood and the fire pit ready to go for the back yard.

Grill is ready too along with the Spagetty Pot and other things to cook with.

 

Please remember i have limited parking in Wethersfield so park carefully in the back yard and next door.

 

 

See some of you soon..

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my Orange Stryped Cones Roadside by the Parking Lot on Hopewell Rd.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK
